study_content: An insurer must notify the Commissioner within 30 days of terminating a producer's appointment. They must also mail a copy of the notification to the producer within 15 days.
It is illegal to knowingly make, publish, or circulate any false or maliciously critical statement regarding the financial condition of an insurer intended to deceive.
Entering into any agreement to commit an act of boycott, coercion, or intimidation resulting in unreasonable restraint of, or monopoly in, the business of insurance is strictly prohibited.
Insurers cannot charge different rates or offer different benefits to individuals of the same risk class. Discrimination based on race, color, creed, or national origin is strictly forbidden.

Offering anything of value (money, gifts, or special favors) that is not specified in the insurance contract as an inducement to buy insurance is illegal. Both offering and accepting a rebate are violations.
A producer acting as an agent holds all premiums collected in a fiduciary trust. Misappropriating or converting these funds for personal use is a serious violation of trust and law.
